data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro, Res: 1920x1080, Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
data.actual_result: Items can appear fuzzy and hard to read.
data.short_description: Fuzzy view caused by Intel HD Graphics "Conservative Morphological Anti-Aliasing" set to "Enhance Application Settings"
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Intel HD graphics control panel - Go to 3D - Change "Conservative Morphological Anti-Aliasing" to "Enhance Application Settings" - Restart Discord
